data.eml:eml: Rondostreptus, a new spirostreptid genus from southeastern Tanzania (Diplopoda: Spirostreptidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hoffman, Richard L. (2011): Rondostreptus, a new spirostreptid genus from southeastern Tanzania (Diplopoda: Spirostreptidae). Zootaxa 2779: 63-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.202008
